skills.label: Manage customer records
items: Create and maintain a current customer base organizational structure
Identify potential sales opportunities by utilizing core records such as accounts, contacts and customers

skills.label: Manage the sales process
items: Create and maintain sales transactional records
Track the sales progression
Manage the sales process from lead generation through quote, order, and invoice creation

skills.label: Manage customer communication
items: Create and manage social engagement sources, identify opportunities and generate leads

skills.label: Manage sales literature and competitors
items: Create and maintain a sales literature repository, create an organized methodology for identifying and tracking competitors

skills.label: Manage leads
items: Identify leads and track them throughout the conversion process, reactivate or delete disqualified leads

skills.label: Identify and manage opportunities
items: Identify opportunities to track throughout the sales workflow, create opportunities with a defined status, create records within the opportunity form, assign opportunities to designated sales staff

skills.label: Utilize opportunity functionality
items: Close and document opportunities as won or lost, use quick create to add new information, connect opportunities to other record types, apply connections to a data structure

skills.label: Manage opportunity relationships
items: Analyze lost sales opportunities through resolution activities, utilize multiple opportunity views

skills.label: Manage relationship intelligence
items: Provision and configure relationship insights to integrate with exchange, create and prioritize actions and tasks, track interactions, manage sales communication

skills.label: Manage relationship analysis
items: Provision and configure relationship intelligence, create actionable and productivity cards by using relationship assistant

skills.label: Integrate email with Dynamics 365 Sales
items: Track interactions with a specific email
Manage sales relationships through statistical analysis of email activity, untracked emails and performance activities
Manage sales relationships with email engagement
Use engagement analytics and auto-capture

skills.label: Manage sales by using sales analysis tools
items: Improve sales tracking by using advanced find, editable grids and built-in reports
Export data to excel in both static and dynamic processes
Export excel templates

skills.label: Manage the business process flow
items: Manage the tasks required of each state in the business process flow, create territories and assign them to managers and sales staff, configure currency and exchange rates

skills.label: Manage Products by using the Product Catalog
items: Manage prices lists, discount lists and unit groups
Create, maintain and clone products
Manage the product lifecycle

skills.label: Manage price structures
items: Create price lists, create discount list models, assign currencies to products

skills.label: Manage product relationships
items: Identify product relationships, differentiate product relationships by family units, customize properties for all products, identify and bundle related products

skills.label: Manage sales transactional records
items: Create price and revenue structures with inclusion of line items, currency rates, exchange rates, and write-in products
Manage the quote lifecycle
Create and manage quotes, orders, and invoices

skills.label: Manage goals
items: Create manageable and measurable goals, delineate goals by fiscal periods, specify definitions and goal metric records, analyze individual and organizational progress by creating goal hierarchies, use rollup queries

skills.label: Manage visual tools with Sales Analysis
items: Create documents and templates, integrate charts and dashboards

skills.label: Operate Dynamics 365 sales functions
items: Identify and define the functional areas of dynamics 365 sales, model relationships and records in microsoft dynamics 365, access dynamics 365 sales through various client access methods, utilize the help center

skills.label: Perform data management
items: Create customers and contacts within 365 sales, enforce customer relationship by using activity types, use views and global searches

skills.label: Perform lifecycle management
items: Utilize leads, convert leads into customers in the lead life cycle, perform opportunity management, manage cases
